1.name: The King of Comedy
1.description: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

2.name: First Blood
2.description: A formidable but unstable veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

3.name: The Dark Crystal
3.description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

4.name: Blade Runner
4.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

5.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
5.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

6.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
6.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

7.name: The Thing
7.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

8.name: Creepshow
8.description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

9.name: Poltergeist
9.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

10.name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
10.description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

11.name: Grease 2
11.description: An English student at a 1960s American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

12.name: Tootsie
12.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

13.name: Conan the Barbarian
13.description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

14.name: Gandhi
14.description: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

15.name: Annie
15.description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

16.name: Friday the 13th Part III
16.description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

17.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
17.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

18.name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
18.description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

19.name: Rocky III
19.description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

20.name: TRON
20.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

21.name: 48 Hrs.
21.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

22.name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
22.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

23.name: Swamp Thing
23.description: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

24.name: Sophie's Choice
24.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

25.name: The Slumber Party Massacre
25.description: A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening.

26.name: Cat People
26.description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

27.name: The Secret of NIMH
27.description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

28.name: Death Wish II
28.description: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

29.name: Zapped!
29.description: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

30.name: The Year of Living Dangerously
30.description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

31.name: Forbidden World
31.description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

32.name: The Last American Virgin
32.description: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

33.name: The Beastmaster
33.description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

34.name: The Entity
34.description: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

35.name: Class of 1984
35.description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

36.name: The Verdict
36.description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

37.name: La passante du Sans-Souci
37.description: Being imprisoned for murdering a politician, husband tells his wife why he did this.

38.name: The Last Unicorn
38.description: A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil King who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.

39.name: Fanny och Alexander
39.description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

40.name: Airplane II: The Sequel
40.description: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

41.name: Fitzcarraldo
41.description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

42.name: Personal Best
42.description: The intertwined lives and loves of three highly-ranked athletes striving for the national team; Chris bounces between the beds of male coach Terry and her female friend, competitor, and role model Tory.

43.name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
43.description: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

44.name: Frances
44.description: The story of Frances Farmer's meteoric rise to fame in Hollywood and the tragic turn her life took when she was blacklisted.

45.name: Victor Victoria
45.description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

46.name: Diner
46.description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

47.name: Basket Case
47.description: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed Siamese-twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

48.name: Amityville II: The Possession
48.description: A family moves into their new home, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of the teenage son. Only the local priest can save him.

49.name: My Favorite Year
49.description: A dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a live TV variety show.

50.name: Mil gritos tiene la noche
50.description: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.
